tagline: Sustainable health — meal plans, fitness, sleep, and stress management that fits your actual life
pros: Holistic approach — connects nutrition, fitness, sleep, and stress
Builds plans around real constraints — time, budget, skill, preferences
cons: Not a medical professional — can't diagnose or advise on medications
Generalist depth — a sports nutritionist or strength coach goes deeper
Won't enable unsustainable crash approaches, even if asked

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
